Title: Who Is Stan Ford?
Writer: Tom Bidwell (adapted by), Rae Earl (based on: "My Fat,  Mad Teenage Diary" by), George Kay
Actors: Bamshad Abedi-Amin, Kirsty Armstrong, Ciara Baxendale, Lolita Chakrabarti
Plot: 1998 last summer in Stamford. The gang plan to celebrate their last summer together, Before leaving for uni. Rae gets a job in a record shop and doesn't want things to change.
